en_GB{
    %%Parent{"en_001"}
    Version{"2.1.47.86"}
    calendar{
        generic{
            availableFormats{
                MEd{"E dd/MM"}
                MMMEd{"E d MMM"}
            }
            intervalFormats{
                M{
                    M{"M–M"}
                }
                MMMd{
                    d{"d–d MMM"}
                }
                Md{
                    M{"dd/MM–dd/MM"}
                    d{"dd/MM–dd/MM"}
                }
                d{
                    d{"d–d"}
                }
                y{
                    y{"y–y G"}
                }
                yMMMd{
                    d{"d–d MMM y G"}
                }
            }
        }
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "HH:mm:ss zzzz",
                "HH:mm:ss z",
                "HH:mm:ss",
                "HH:mm",
                "EEEE, d MMMM y",
                "d MMMM y",
                "d MMM y",
                "dd/MM/y",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
            }
            dayPeriod{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        noon{"noon"}
                    }
                    narrow{
                        noon{"n"}
                    }
                    wide{
                        noon{"noon"}
                    }
                }
                stand-alone{
                    narrow{
                        pm{"pm"}
                    }
                }
            }
            intervalFormats{
                H{
                    H{"HH–HH"}
                }
                Hm{
                    H{"HH:mm–HH:mm"}
                    m{"HH:mm–HH:mm"}
                }
                Hmv{
                    H{"HH:mm–HH:mm v"}
                    m{"HH:mm–HH:mm v"}
                }
                Hv{
                    H{"HH–HH v"}
                }
                M{
                    M{"M–M"}
                }
                MMMd{
                    d{"d–d MMM"}
                }
                d{
                    d{"d–d"}
                }
                h{
                    h{"h–h a"}
                }
                hv{
                    h{"h–h a v"}
                }
                y{
                    y{"y–y"}
                }
                yMMMd{
                    d{"d–d MMM y"}
                }
            }
        }
        islamic{
            availableFormats{
                MEd{"E dd/MM"}
                MMMEd{"E d MMM"}
            }
        }
    }
    characterLabel{
        math_symbols{"maths symbol"}
    }
    fields{
        day{
            relative{
                "-1"{"yesterday"}
                "0"{"today"}
                "1"{"tomorrow"}
            }
        }
        day-narrow{
            relative{
                "-1"{"yesterday"}
                "0"{"today"}
                "1"{"tomorrow"}
            }
        }
        day-short{
            relative{
                "-1"{"yesterday"}
            }
            relativeTime{
                future{
                    other{"in {0} days"}
                }
                past{
                    other{"{0} days ago"}
                }
            }
        }
    }
    listPattern{
        or{
            end{"{0} or {1}"}
        }
        standard{
            end{"{0} and {1}"}
        }
        standard-short{
            2{"{0} and {1}"}
            end{"{0} and {1}"}
        }
    }
}
